channel.title: Comments on: Bolder in Business: How to Cultivate Confidence

item.description: Thank you, Paul! And welcome to the conversation! :)

item.title: By: Paul Roforepe

item.description: It is really encouraging and also supports what really happens in our lives.
item.content:encoded: It is really encouraging and also supports what really happens in our lives.

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Wonderful, Viola! Confidence can work wonders. And a supportive community is crucial when things don't immediately go how we'd like them to. I'm glad to hear you're keeping positive!
item.content:encoded: Wonderful, Viola! Confidence can work wonders. And a supportive community is crucial when things don’t immediately go how we’d like them to. I’m glad to hear you’re keeping positive!

item.title: By: Viola Gary
item.dc:creator: Viola Gary
item.description: After reading this post, I thought, yes I can and I must keep positive thoughts like "I AM Sure I want to write and get paid. Thanks for the backup and the forward push to do so. Confidence is the best push to do anything. Reminders can also do that. You have done both. Thank you much.
item.content:encoded: After reading this post, I thought, yes I can and I must keep positive thoughts like “I AM Sure I want to write and get paid. Thanks for the backup and the forward push to do so. Confidence is the best push to do anything. Reminders can also do that. You have done both. Thank you much.

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Exactly, Dionne. What we go through shapes us. The most interesting things people have to share (and what they feel the most growth from) are those points along the path when they met challenges and took the opportunity to let it clarify for them who they wanted to be. :) Seeing it is half the battle.
item.content:encoded: Exactly, Dionne. What we go through shapes us. The most interesting things people have to share (and what they feel the most growth from) are those points along the path when they met challenges and took the opportunity to let it clarify for them who they wanted to be. ðŸ™‚ Seeing it is half the battle.

item.title: By: Dionne
item.dc:creator: Dionne
item.description: I've spent a long time fighting self limiting beliefs, but I've always known that I'm destined for bigger things and I felt quite tearful earlier that although it's taken me so long to get here and learn everything that I have learned, I've been on this journey for a reason and it's made me who I am now. Over the last few months I've received so much knowledge and help to be more confident in myself and I know that once the success hits, it will hit big time! Thank you Sabrina xx
item.content:encoded: I’ve spent a long time fighting self limiting beliefs, but I’ve always known that I’m destined for bigger things and I felt quite tearful earlier that although it’s taken me so long to get here and learn everything that I have learned, I’ve been on this journey for a reason and it’s made me who I am now. Over the last few months I’ve received so much knowledge and help to be more confident in myself and I know that once the success hits, it will hit big time! Thank you Sabrina xx

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Hi Jo! That made me laugh. Thanks for the kind words.
item.content:encoded: Hi Jo! That made me laugh. Thanks for the kind words.

item.title: By: Jo Horton
item.dc:creator: Jo Horton
item.description: I am, successful. Thank you, Sabrina! I love watching you, so skinny and beautiful. I loved watching you interview Carl James Harvey. So much beautiful energy. You look like a life size barbie doll.
item.content:encoded: I am, successful. Thank you, Sabrina! I love watching you, so skinny and beautiful. I loved watching you interview Carl James Harvey. So much beautiful energy. You look like a life size barbie doll.

item.content:encoded: Thank you so much! Glad to hear it resonates with you!

item.title: By: Puran
item.dc:creator: Puran
item.description: Thank you Sabrina. "Half a step forward" is brilliant. Thank you again.
item.content:encoded: Thank you Sabrina. “Half a step forward” is brilliant. Thank you again.
